campaign.title: Sudan Relief Convoys Support Campaign
campaign.description1: Together, we extend a helping hand to our people in Sudan through humanitarian convoys carrying food, medicine, and essential supplies.
campaign.description2: Contribute with us every day to be part of the hope.

timeline.2000: Launch of the first joint relief initiative
timeline.2005: Organizing food convoys to remote areas
timeline.2010: Introducing medical support as a core part of campaigns
timeline.2023: Launch of the Sudan Rescue Convoys campaign
timeline.2025: Expanding the campaign to include new states

beneficiaries.title: More than {{count}} beneficiaries of the relief campaign

water.title: 14% Clean Water

shelter.description: Tents and supplies for the displaced

psychSupport.description: Psychological care for children and women

latest.title: Read the Latest Articles and Reports About the Campaign
latest.description: Learn about the campaign's efforts, success stories, and volunteers' experiences in supporting those affected in Sudan

preparation.title: How Are Relief Convoys Prepared Before Departure?
preparation.description: We review the stages of preparing convoys, from collecting donations to equipping trucks with medical and food supplies

stories.title: Humanitarian Stories from the Heart of Sudan
stories.description: Learn about the testimonies of families and individuals whose lives have changed thanks to the aid they received

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description1: A humanitarian campaign aimed at sending relief convoys to support those affected
contact.description2: in Sudan through food, medicine, and essential supplies
